details: I have had this laptop only a day, but so far I think it is super. It replaces a 4 year old XPS 13. The Gram is light years ahead of it in terms of speed. No comparison. I love the fingerprint reader also.

This is a great Chromebook for a middle to highschooler. It has a real long battery life charges quickly, and maintains a strong wireless signal. The touchscreen is very responsive and we haven’t had any problems with it at all. It has a very comfortable keyboard.
I really like this model because it’s super-light and durable. It has very long battery life so I’m taking this laptop to every where. Definitely recommend to everyone
